Achievement.Title: The Beginning
Achievement.Description: Complete the story, embracing the New World.

Achievement.Title: The Ura
Achievement.Description: Stop the siege on the Bastion.

Achievement.Title: The Singer
Achievement.Description: Complete Prosper Bluff and speak with the Singer in the Bastion.

Achievement.Title: The Survivor
Achievement.Description: Complete the Hanging Gardens and speak with the Survivor in the Bastion.
